Description: Necklace of 26 gold collared beads with circular depressions, interspersed with 25 gold oval pendants on chains, and six small spherical gold beads.
Curator's comments: Made on Crete, or by immigrant Cretan craftsmen on Aegina.
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (753.a)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2018 27 Mar-9 Sep, Los Angeles, Getty Centre, Egypt-Greece-Rome: Cultures in Contact
